comments.body:
```suggestion
        align?: Array<'l' | 'r' | 'c' | '.' | null>;
```

I think the `?` in the property name for `align` already allows `undefined`, but adding the `null` looks good to me.

@saadq no so, because the `?` just says (option A) the option can be missing entirely or (option B) the property can be present and be set to the value `undefined` or (option c) it can be an array containing those possible values (the possible values are listed between the `<`/`>`s.  The `?` does not allow one of the values of the array to be `undefined`.
